parameters.name: MateTypeFromEnum
parameters.description: Type of mate as defined in swMateType_e

parameters.name: AlignFromEnum
parameters.description: Type of alignment desired as defined in swMateAlign_e

parameters.name: Flip
parameters.description: True to flip the component, false to not

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Distance value to use with distance or limit mates

parameters.name: DistanceAbsUpperLimit
parameters.description: Absolute maximum distance allowed

parameters.name: DistanceAbsLowerLimit
parameters.description: Absolute minimum distance allowed

parameters.name: GearRatioNumerator
parameters.description: Gear ratio numerator value for gear mates

parameters.name: GearRatioDenominator
parameters.description: Gear ratio denominator value for gear mates

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Angle value to use with angle mates

parameters.name: AngleAbsUpperLimit
parameters.description: Absolute maximum angle allowed

parameters.name: AngleAbsLowerLimit
parameters.description: Absolute minimum angle allowed

parameters.name: ErrorStatus
parameters.description: Success or error as defined by swAddMateError_e

title: IAssemblyDoc.EditMate2
signature:
void EditMate2( 
   System.Int32
MateTypeFromEnum
,
   System.Int32
AlignFromEnum
,
   System.Boolean
Flip
,
   System.Double
Distance
,
   System.Double
DistanceAbsUpperLimit
,
   System.Double
DistanceAbsLowerLimit
,
   System.Double
GearRatioNumerator
,
   System.Double
GearRatioDenominator
,
   System.Double
Angle
,
   System.Double
AngleAbsUpperLimit
,
   System.Double
AngleAbsLowerLimit
,
   out System.Int32
ErrorStatus
)

parameters.name: MateTypeFromEnum
parameters.description: Type of mate as defined in swMateType_e

parameters.name: AlignFromEnum
parameters.description: Type of alignment desired as defined in swMateAlign_e

parameters.name: Flip
parameters.description: True to flip the component, false to not

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Distance value to use with distance or limit mates

parameters.name: DistanceAbsUpperLimit
parameters.description: Absolute maximum distance allowed

parameters.name: DistanceAbsLowerLimit
parameters.description: Absolute minimum distance allowed

parameters.name: GearRatioNumerator
parameters.description: Gear ratio numerator value for gear mates

parameters.name: GearRatioDenominator
parameters.description: Gear ratio denominator value for gear mates

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Angle value to use with angle mates

parameters.name: AngleAbsUpperLimit
parameters.description: Absolute maximum angle allowed

parameters.name: AngleAbsLowerLimit
parameters.description: Absolute minimum angle allowed

parameters.name: ErrorStatus
parameters.description: Success or error as defined by swAddMateError_e

remarks:
The first selection should be the two items that are mated (that is, two faces, edge and face, and so on), and the third selection should be the mate feature to be edited. The mate feature must be selected last. The two mated items must be selected with a selection mark of 1. See
ISelectData
or
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
for details on using selection marks.
If mateType is swMateDISTANCE or swMateANGLE when the mate is applied to the closest position that meets the mate condition specified by distance or angle, then setting flip to True moves the assembly to the other possible mate position.
This method does not support editing
Inplace
mates.
